Remarks

Note that some part of IOHexperimenter have been writthen by other teams. We acknowledge that:

  • The pseudo random number generator is implemented by NumBBO/CCCO team in the Numerical Black-Box Optimization Benchmarking Framework (https://github.com/numbbo/coco).
